app.title: LoopMate
app.tagline: Create videos in 1 minute, even for beginners

imageMusic.title: Create YouTube Video
imageMusic.description: Music only is OK! Creates a 16:9 YouTube video with a black background if no image is provided.

loop.title: Extend Video Loop
loop.description: Extends a short video loop to your desired length.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure language, file extensions, and audio quality settings.

labels.musicPlaylistSub: Multiple files can be selected at once

options.title: Options
options.fadeOut: Apply fade out at the end of each track
options.fadeOutDesc: Makes tracks end naturally. Essential for compilation videos.
options.paddingDesc: Adds rest time after each track. Image continues, only music pauses. Added after the last track too for seamless looping!
options.fadeIn: Apply fade in at the start (Optional)
options.videoFadeOut: Apply fade out at the end of each video
options.videoFadeOutDesc: Makes videos end naturally. Essential for compilation videos.
options.videoPaddingDesc: Inserts black screen between videos (transition effect). Recommended for compilation videos.

fastMode.title: âš¡ Fast Mode (Recommended)
fastMode.description: Use original audio quality for maximum speed (10-30x faster)
fastMode.slowWarning: Processing will be significantly slower when Fast Mode is disabled.

audioQuality.title: Audio Quality
audioQuality.description: Choose audio quality for video generation. Higher quality = better sound but larger file size.

fileExtensions.title: Allowed File Extensions
fileExtensions.description: Configure which file extensions are allowed for each file type. Separate multiple extensions with commas (e.g., .jpg, .png, .webp).
fileExtensions.formatHint: Separate extensions with commas. Include the dot (e.g., .jpg, .png)

tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.content:
1. Disclaimer: This software is provided 'as is' without warranty of any kind. The developer makes no guarantees regarding the software's performance or reliability.

2. Limitation of Liability: In no event shall the developer be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, data loss or business interruption) arising out of the use of this software. Please always backup your files.

3. Open Source: This software uses FFmpeg licensed under the LGPLv2.1.
tos.notice: This translation is provided for convenience. The English version is legally binding.

messages.videoCreated: A 1920x1080 (16:9) MP4 video will be created next to the original music file when completed.
messages.historyEmpty: Completed or failed jobs will appear here.

fileDropZone.selectFile: Select {{label}}. Allowed formats: {{extensions}}. Click to browse or drag and drop a file here.

emptyState.title: Drag or click to add files

resume.title: Unfinished Tasks Detected
resume.description: There are {{count}} tasks that were not completed in the last session. Would you like to restart them now?

about.title: About Developer
about.mission: We know that making music takes more emotional energy than you might think. LoopMate was created to make that process a little less tiring and a little less hurtful.

errors.tip1: Check if the file is not corrupted
errors.tip3: Ensure the file path contains only English characters (optional)
errors.label: Error:

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.description: The application encountered an unexpected error. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
errorBoundary.helpText: If this problem continues, please report it on GitHub Issues. You can find the log file by clicking the 'Open Log Folder' button above.

support.title: Help & Support
support.logsDescription: If you encounter issues, please report them on GitHub Issues. The log file helps diagnose app problems.

resetData.title: Reset All Data
resetData.description: This action cannot be undone. The following data will be deleted:
resetData.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone.
resetData.error: An error occurred while clearing data.

consentModal.title: Help improve LoopMate
consentModal.description: Anonymous usage data helps us fix bugs and improve features.
consentModal.benefit1: App usage patterns (which features are used most)

feature3.title: Merge Videos
feature3.description: Multiple videos â†’ Combined into one

warnings.effectsRequireReencoding: Fade/Padding effects require audio re-encoding, which is slower. For fastest processing (10-30x faster), turn off these effects.
warnings.fastModeDesc: Using original audio quality with stream copy (no re-encoding). Processing will be 10-30x faster!

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Try it out with sample files (one click!)
quickStart.loadSuccessDesc: "{{name}}" is ready. Add it to the queue now.
